article:
The following 'list of Indian monarchs' is one of several lists of
incumbents. Dayanand Saraswati, Satyartha Prakash

Early mythical and later documented rulers and dynasties who are deemed to have
ruled a portion of the Indian subcontinent and were based in South Asia are
included in this list.
headings: Foreign Emperors in North-Western India (c. 538 BC – 750 AD)
[[Tomara Dynasty|Tomar's or Tuar's]] of Sthaneshwar and Indraprastha (736–1192 AD)
[[Sena Dynasty|Sena Empire]] Dynasty rule over [[Bengal]] (1070–1230 CE)
The major Muslim vassals of the Mughal/British Paramountcy (1707–1856)
